WRITING.TITLE: One by one, all of my best friends have started to become interested in men as well as women.
WRITING.TEXT: So Im just sitting here, watching the world go bi.
Or some to break in from the backdoor

WRITING.TITLE: Every girl is beautiful.
WRITING.TEXT: Sometimes it just takes the right amount of alcohol to see it.

WRITING.TITLE: I was a bit paranoid about my sexual prowess after catching my wife filling in a Cosmopolitan questionnaire -
WRITING.TEXT:
"Is Your Man Bad In Bed?".
"It's just something to do when I'm bored" she protested.
"That's a relief," I replied, as I carried on thrusting.

WRITING.TITLE: I just gave my cat some 7UP.
So an American college kid walks into a bar...
100 ways to please your man
WRITING.TEXT:
My wife was sitting on the sofa last night reading a book called, 100 ways to please your man.
I said, Dont bother reading any of that nonsense, you only need to do two things for me and Ill be the happiest bloke ever.
She smiled and said, Aww, whats that then?
I said, Pack your bags and fcuk off.

WRITING.TITLE: I tried to teach my dog to dance today.
WRITING.TEXT: It was useless. Hes got two left feet.

WRITING.TITLE: Apparently Sly Stallone is in talks to make Rocky 8.
WRITING.TEXT: In this one hell fight Arthritis.
